website_summaries.verdict: This metal dust pan performs like the steel pans, but is made of a lighter-weight aluminum.
pros: Rubber handle makes a comfortable grip
Edges are fine and can pick up a lot of small debris easily
Loop handle is easy to hold and easy to hang for storage
cons: This size is best for the garden or garage rather than the kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Super handy and versatile debris pan
customer_reviews.text: First the pros - great tool for the shop, the yard, the driveway, multi use. I use it a lot in outdoor landscape cleanup with a mid sized lawn rake. Excellent sturdy two-pronged rubber grip handle. Plus, looks like the manufacturer got the message on not putting that impossible to remove sticker on the front. Mine didn't have one. The cons - the metal gauge is a little lighter than I expected. I had a contractors aluminum dust pan previously of similar size and it was a little heavier gauge. I still give it a 5 though.
customer_reviews.author: jgates

customer_reviews.title: I love your dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I love your dustpan, with one very annoying exception. The label that is placed right on the dust surface does not come off, so now I have a dustpan that has part of a label collecting dirt and dust and it looks nasty. How difficult would it be to put a REMOVABLE label on the dust pan?
customer_reviews.author: Janet Dob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garage/driveway sweeping
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a regular-sized dust plan for years. I finally upgraded to this larger size. I should have done this a long time ago. This dust pan is sturdy, light weight, and far better for garage and driveway sweeping in that it holds way more. And there were no stickers on the pan. I've read reviews about pans with stickers that are nearly impossible to remove. No problem with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a 70 employee manufacturing facility and we absolutely love these dust pans. Excellent quality, light and never rust. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Curry

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a rubber edge at the front
customer_reviews.text: This product would be perfect if it had a rubber edge on the front. The edge is too sharp and cuts the crap out of flooring and your hand. I’m wondering if it is just missing the rubber edge as there is one at the top. It’s very large, exceptionally light weight and great design w the handle. Will be using it if we get ice. Have to go find another product that won’t slice our hands.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Steil

customer_reviews.title: had to copy my contractors!
customer_reviews.text: We are in the midst of a remodeling project, and saw this big dustpan and 'borrowed' it one afternoon to sweep up the walkway. I'm hooked! I ordered one for my both my husband and my son as 'Father's Day' gifts. Very handy and useful and you will never go back to the small dustpan again!
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: Functional as promised-Label annoying
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, the sticker right in the middle of the otherwise semi-attractive dustpan is ugly, annoying and very difficult to remove. First I tried to peel some of the mylar layer off the top of the sticker with my fingernail. After that, I placed a rag soaked in paint thinner over the sticker and weighed it down with a brick. I resoaked the rag every day and repeated for four days in a row. After that, the sicker peeled right off.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great old fashioned large aluminum dust pan. Great tools usually make tasks go just a little easier and this dust pan does just that.
customer_reviews.author: mxusa8383

customer_reviews.title: A high quality tool worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality tool and I’m really happy with it. It was worth a little extra money because I can use it for many things in the yard
customer_reviews.author: Janice Seals

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made and light to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really can't call this dust pan a shop dust pan because I have a old one in my shop. I purchased this one to perform clean up on outside project's. I also wanted it stored outside so the aluminum construction is perfect. I would highly recommend this dust pan for "All" clean up activities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It was just what I was looking for. Have used plastic one in the past, but eventually the handle always breaks. I use it not only for heavy duty cleaning in the garage. The metal edge allows you to pick up fine particles when you are sweeping. Product was delivered quickly and was great value for the price. It worked better than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice dust pan but impossible to remove sticker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dust pan, a little larger than I expected. However, they put a huge sticker right on top that is extremely difficult to get off. This is after 5 minutes of scraping and it still won’t come off. They could have easily used a different sticker or put this information on a tag.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Very good dustpan. Sturdy, large and lightweight. Very good build quality. Comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bone MD

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sticker Placement
customer_reviews.text: Overall great dustpan. Only problem I have is with the sticker that was chosen to be placed on the front of the dustpan. This sticker does not come off and causes dirt and dust to get stuck to the pan when you sweep anything into it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Collins

customer_reviews.title: Sticky label ruins the tool
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike the most is that the Dust pan comes with a huge adhesive label on it that seems impossible to remove without scratching up the surface. What a shame to mess up a nicely designed tool
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This dust pan works much better than plastic equivalents, large size works very well for cleaning up messes in the garage and yard.
customer_reviews.author: westinld

customer_reviews.title: this dust pan is the best I have ever used. Heavy duty in all respects.
customer_reviews.text: Cant think of any thing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Best pan out there
customer_reviews.text: Excellent aluminum pan. I use this in my garage and the light weight and strong handle make it easy to use. My old plastic one didn’t last long, this seems to be well made, I swept up a pile of dirt and nails on a job at home the wide pan made it so much easier. 5 Stars is what I give this.
customer_reviews.author: michael ray smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan was exactly what I wanted. It's sturdy but not too heavy for a small woman to handle. I've already used it several times and was satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma the yogi

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES your big dustpans. He says they are s must for working in his shop. They are light and hold tons!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan is exactly as described! Very sturdy and lightweight. We have hickory nuts from the neighbor’s tree and I take them I scoop them up with the pan! It holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Handy

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Like everyone else said the sticker placement is stupid. I burned my sticker off and then used carb cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Tjl223308

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Simple but excellent product. One of those basics everyone needs. Provides a sharp edge to minimize the dust that often gets pushed under the lip of cheaper dustpans. Wide enough to accommodate a good sized push broom. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Darr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and his new "old" house. I think it's working
customer_reviews.author: GGB

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great for yard cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just the right size for the job, lightweight and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: vadim kagramanov

customer_reviews.title: Over all uses
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the extra large dust pan, as it does allow for all types of clean up tasks. It is very light, but strong at the same time. It also stores well on our tool rack in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan is well designed and made. It arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An oustanding dust pan!
customer_reviews.text: It works unusually well, do it's straight and thin edge. And at a much lower price than a similar pan at Restoration Hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great aluminum dust pan. I love the wide size and the sturdy handle. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Stieg

customer_reviews.title: It was so well liked the ice crew immediately threw away the old one
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use to scoop us ice scrapings at the curling club. It was so well liked the ice crew immediately threw away the old one. It's light and works great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Fathergill

customer_reviews.title: Leaf cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Great for fall leaves disposal. Sturdy metal pan with a handy loop handle to hang up
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Seems picey but it is probably the last dust pan you will ever have to buy! May seem silly but when you need a larger sized dust pan...this is it...not too heavy, sturdy and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: DLVH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, light weight dustpan.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, light weight dustpan. Plenty big for any job you throw at it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Shop Dust Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great dust pan. Bought for use in pole barn. Love the size, price and quality. Would buy again if needed a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Bears3

customer_reviews.title: it is durable
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use, durable, and according to my dad, like a shovel
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't gotten beaten up like the ones I've gotten from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for... will put it to work soon .. Thanks for quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dust pan. I can sweep entire garage without having to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: braveheart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A must for the garage or wood shop.
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but still heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts. The dustpan is heavy duty but still lightweight. Love the rubber handle. My dad and husband were pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kellye

customer_reviews.title: ... the job and light enough for my wife to easily handle. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to do the job and light enough for my wife to easily handle. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ball

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pan is a must for garage and yard cleanup - strong and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dustpan!
customer_reviews.text: We love the extra large dustpan! It is lightweight and makes cleanup jobs much faster.
customer_reviews.author: golf4gold

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy dustpan that picks up large items. Good value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Silvino Totomicas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have for every home owner with a garage!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Does what a DustPan should do.
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan is a replacement for a steel dustpan that is nearly indestructible, but weighs to much for the job I need it to do. The Edwards dustpan does the same job, but doesn't take both hands to lift it. Glad I bought the Edwards dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: As Sturdy as it is Light
customer_reviews.text: Ever pick up one of those super expensive pro racing bicycles and be shocked at it's feather weight? That's what came to mind when I lifted this pan out of its' box, though the material is strong, and construction/design is perfect for a dustpan suitable for yard tasks (dirt/leaves/clippings etc.) After using it for a week, I liked it enough to order one for my son-in-law. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Strong but light
customer_reviews.text: Hurricane Harvey somehow ate my old aluminum dust pan (along with most of the contents of my garage) so almost two years later I went looking for a replacement and found this one. I put this in my "basic" tool category, extremely useful for what it does. It is sturdy, light weight, and well balanced. Better than my old one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCollough

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy dustpan
customer_reviews.text: What can I say except it is a dustpan. The big difference is in weight; it is lighter which is a plus if you have to bent down and lift over and over while cleaning around house.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I had one this size almost like this one
customer_reviews.text: I had one this size almost like this one. which I really liked; However it was out in the work area where we worked with pecans. I wanted another one to use around the house so I ordered this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than standard ones
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad whose been using a houshold one for meeses in the garage & elsewhere. This is significantly better & bigger than most dustpans. It does its job & would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: A replacement for a cheap plastic one that broke with the first use. What a great replacement. I use for sweeping up leaves and grass clippings. This will last forever. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kar-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Really great basic items are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Functional. We live on a farm, and make some big ol’ messes both indoors and out. This thing is super useful. I love that I can stop throwing away innumerable woefully inadequate broken plastic pans now. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Great backsaver
customer_reviews.text: Beats all smaller dust pans. Geat for the garage, decks and porch, can sweep up large piles with a broom and it's construction prevents spilling. Easy on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bresnahan

customer_reviews.title: She says it is GREAT! It’s easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter becasue she needed a big dustpan. Theh “light weight” really was essential. She says it is GREAT! It’s easy to hold, hugs the ground well, good material. Very good item!!!!
customer_reviews.author: vsalt

customer_reviews.title: I would buy from this buyer again. A very nice unit. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: I would buy from this buyer again. A very nice unit. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with Comfortable Grip
customer_reviews.text: The dust pan is wonderful for scooping up leaves and debris. It is lightweight and the handle grip is comfortable. My only issue is that I was unable to remove the sticker that covers a good portion of the surface. It will have to wear off with use.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these extra large dustpans for a long time. They are great for sweeping leaves, working in the garden and using inside during construction etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Light weight well built dust pan
customer_reviews.text: Edwards Extra Large Aluminum Dust Pan is very well built. The light weight is perfect for those messy projects.
customer_reviews.author: JHN

customer_reviews.title: Efficient service and exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: My friend had one of these and I searched online and found this one w/your company, I received it promptly, thought it was reasonably priced and the workmanship is superior. Most happy w/the product and the service!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy, large, light weight dust pan
customer_reviews.text: It does everything you would expect, except the lip is not beveled. It doesn't get all the little dust, but that is what the shop vac is for...
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dust pan
customer_reviews.text: This Jumbo dust pan is great ! I use it in my wood shop ,helps out a lot with picking up piles of leaves , spreading bark in the flowerbeds.........
customer_reviews.author: Longview Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Yes there are cheaper ones at big box stores but you get what you pay for! This is sturdier than others and like the coated handle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectations. Very comfortable handle considering it's a dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Featherstone

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and no slip
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and how lightweight this is. The handle is no slip and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. Picks up everything with one stroke of the broom.Light
customer_reviews.author: steve haney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dustpan. Came on time and is a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dustpan. Came on time and is a great size and weight. Used it today in the woodshop to clean up and am very happy with my purchase. Would recommend this company and buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brazil Bill

product_meta.title: Edward Tools Extra Large Industrial Aluminum DustPan 17” - Lightweight - half the weight of steel dust pans with equal strength - For large cleanups - Rubber Loop handle for comfort/hanging (1)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Edward Tools Extra Large Industrial Aluminum DustPan 17” the best aluminum dustpan on the market. The lightweight sing piece aluminum weighs nearly half the weight of steel while providing equal strength. The rubber looped handle is more comfortable and allows the big metal dustpan to be hung up when not in use. This industrial dust pan’s edge is thin enough to sweep small items but thick enough to not bend. A ridge just inside the edge allows the swept items to stay inside while work. Edward Tools Extra Large Industrial Aluminum DustPan 17” comes with a lifetime warranty!
feature_bullets: Extra Large aluminum metal dustpan 17” size for the heaviest of clean ups
Lightweight aluminum weighs nearly half the weight of steel with equal strength
Precision aluminum edge for easier sweeping small items
Rubber grip ergonomic handle for easier grip and to allow hanging dust pan after use
Lifetime warranty - Find a way to bend or chip this dust pan and we will refund or replace your order

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
